body.name: CozyLux Queen Comforter Set - 7 Pieces Comforters Queen Size Navy Blue, Pintuck Bed in A Bag Pinch Pleat Bedding Sets with All Season Comforter, Flat Sheet, Fitted Sheet and Pillowcases & Shams

climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: Fashionable Decoration: Pinch Pleat Bed in a Bag Set create exquisite geometric patterns and look more than stunning that elevate your space with modern and noble elements. it provides timeless elegance and fashion to your bedroom decor.

Soft and Breathable: The king pinch pleat comforter sets have premium microfiber fabric which is breathable and sweat-absorbent. And also the comforter is filled with extremely soft down alternative microfiber which is friendly to those sneezing with goose down and feather bedding; Experience a fabulous night's rest with our sets

Elaborate Design: The elastic deep pocket fitted sheet fits mattress max up to 16" deep. That can always keep non-slip no matter how you twist and turn in your bed. The comforter features durable box stitching which offers sophisticated look alongside simplicity and will also stable inside filling

What You Can Get: Full/Queen Size bed in a bag includes 1 Comforter 88"x88", 2 Pillow Shams 20"x26", 1 Flat Sheet 90"x102" , 1 Fitted Sheet 60"x80"+14" and 2 Pillowcase 20"x30". Our bed in a bag is packaged in a vacuum bag, so you can dry it in low heat or tap the comforter gently while baking it in the sun to fluffy again

Easy Care: The bedding sets are machine washable which can save you more time and energy. For year round softness and prevent pilling up, it's highly recommend to wash it in the gentle cycle with cold water, sun-dry or tumble dry in low when needed. Let our comforter sheets keep providing you and your family with cozy sleeping

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than expected
reviews.reviewText: When I first got the blanket I was hesitant because it was thin but man oh man when I actually used it that night, it revealed that it definitely DOES keep you warm. It’s very soft and I really like how it’s on the thinner side but still keeps in the heat. The look of it is very classy and a great product overall.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love it
reviews.reviewText: Its so comfortable its thick but not too thick i dont like really thick quilted comforters so this worked for me. Pretty light but keeps heat in and i like the design make sure u wash it first tho however contains a slight smell because of shipping but goes away immediatly after a good wash. Make sure to dry everything completly!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great set for the price! Soft and very true to the picture and descriptionWashed multiple times but air dry or do a low tumble dry for comforter

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It’s a decent set, comfy and keeps you warm. But after one wash the threads in the comforter already started coming apart.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and comfy
reviews.reviewText: Very light weight but keeps you warm and it’s very breathable which I love because I tend to get very hot when I sleep! And it’s very soft !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing customer service
reviews.reviewText: I accidentally ordered the wrong size, and contacted the seller after I had already put the bed together. They quickly responded and resolved my issue and they made the process extremely easy. I was incredibly stressed about shipping back such a large box but they were very generous and got me through the process with zero stress. The bed was very beautiful when it came out of the box. The velvet is extremely soft and everything was very sturdy. The process of putting it together was fairly simple and I am excited to get the correct size and finally get to enjoy my new bed! You cannot beat the quality for the price. It is definitely the same quality as some beds you would pay $1000 for at a local furniture retailer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Got this in Queen beige and absolutely love the way it looks and feels. The comforter is nice and fluffy but still light - I’ve been feeling like I’m sleeping in a cloud! My mattress has a high pillow top and the sheets don’t have any problem fitting. The gathered texture adds a high end touch. Definitely recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love the fluffiness and looks great! However..after 2 washes (on gentle as per directions blahblahblah) it has sinched on one corner and feels kinda crunchy. Not so much cooling, but it is light and comfy. If you sweat in your sleep, don't buy for the cooling.
